affiliation_name: Law Office of Michele L. Payer
overview: Payer Supervised Visitations, LLC offers off-site visitation to qualifying families. In order for a family to qualify for off-site visits, Payer Supervised Visitations, LLC staff must determine that it is safe and responsible to allow visitation to occur outside of a facility and the Custodial Parent must give permission of the child to leave any named facilitywith Payer Supervised Visitations, LLC staff.

degrees.subject: Criminal Law
